network.packethandler

Class OutgoingPacketHandler

    public class OutgoingPacketHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • OutgoingPacketHandler

        public OutgoingPacketHandler(NetworkManager networkManager)
        Constructs a new OutgoingPacketHandler. The OutgoingPacketHandler is then started in a new Thread.
        Parameters:
        networkManager - The related NetworkManager.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        A large method. It sends packets and also keeps track of packets which have to be resend.

      • send

        public void send(Packet packet)
        Broadcasts a packet over a Multicast group network

        Broadcasted packets will be added to a tentative list As long as a tentative packet has not been received, it will be retransmitted

        Parameters:
        packet - Packet the packet that will be broadcasted to the multicast network

      • handleACK

        public Packet handleACK(Packet ackPacket)
        Handles an Acknowledgement packet

        Finds the floating packet that has been acknowledged and removes it from the map. Then the packet does not get resend again, and again, and again, and again....

        Parameters:
        ackPacket - The packet to be removed
        Returns:
        The original packet linked to this ACK.

      • getLastPingSend

        public long getLastPingSend()
        Gets the time when the last ping packet has been send as a long and in millis.
        Returns:
        Time of the last ping.

      • scheduleForResend

        private void scheduleForResend(Packet packet)
        Schedules a packet for a resent

        Makes a new floating packet if necessary. Adding it to the floatingPacketMap if there are resends left for the packet

        Parameters:
        packet - The packet that must be resend.
        See Also:
        FloatingPacket
